description technical detail:
NEC MultiSync EA304WMi-BK - 30" - LED-Backlit LCD Monitor
The 30" NEC MultiSync EA304WMi is a 2560 x 1600 widescreen LCD for high-performance enterprise users that require a huge workspace, advanced technologies and a complete feature set. Designed to enhance work performance, this high resolution display features IPS panel technology with wide viewing angles and ergonomic adjustability. The LED backlighting of the EA304WMi allows for a slimmer profile, lighter weight and increased power savings. This model also boasts a height-adjustable stand and full connectivity with DisplayPort, HDMI, DVI-D and VGA inputs.
display type: LED-backlit LCD monitor / TFT active matrix
features: Ambient light sensor, picture by picture, ErgoDesign, cable management cover, Eco-Mode, Auto Contrast, ControlSync, Carbon Footprint Meter, Carbon Savings Meter, Human Sensor
Security lock slot (cable lock sold separately)
